changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE source ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, list INTEGER NOT NULL REFERENCES list(id), campaign INTEGER NOT NULL REFERENCES campaign(id), created TIMESTAMP DEFAULT now() NOT NULL )
INSERT INTO source (list, campaign) SELECT list.id, campaign.id FROM campaign JOIN list ON list.id = campaign.list
ALTER TABLE campaign ADD COLUMN owner VARCHAR(255)
UPDATE campaign SET owner = s.owner FROM (SELECT campaign.id, list.owner FROM campaign JOIN list ON list.id = campaign.list) AS s WHERE campaign.id = s.id
ALTER TABLE campaign ALTER COLUMN owner SET NOT NULL
ALTER TABLE campaign DROP COLUMN list
